statements: SELECT * FROM CreditScoreReports WHERE credit_score > 700
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM CreditScoreReports WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM CreditScoreReports ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM CreditScoreReports WHERE credit_score < 500 ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_id, credit_score FROM CreditScoreReports
SELECT * FROM CreditScoreReports WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM CreditScoreReports WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM CreditScoreReports WHERE credit_score < 500 OR credit_score > 800 ORDER BY credit_score ASC
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM CreditScoreReports WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' OR customer_name LIKE '%Doe%'
SELECT AVG(credit_score) AS avg_credit_score, MAX(credit_score) AS max_credit_score FROM CreditScoreReports
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id='12345';
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, score FROM credit_scores WHERE score > 700 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, score FROM customers INNER JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE full_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, score, timestamp FROM credit_scores WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_reports WHERE generation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;

SELECT customers.first_name, credit_scores.credit_score, credit_reports.report_content FROM customers JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id JOIN credit_reports ON credit_scores.credit_score_id = credit_reports.credit_score_id;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, a.street_address, a.city FROM customers c INNER JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city FROM customers INNER JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, cr.credit_score FROM customers c JOIN credit_scores cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id WHERE cr.credit_score >= 750;
SELECT cr.report_id, cr.generated_date, cc.credit_score FROM credit_reports cr JOIN credit_scores cc ON cr.credit_score_id = cc.credit_score_id ORDER BY cr.generated_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer LIMIT 10;
SELECT full_name, address, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT full_name, credit_score, report_date FROM Customer INNER JOIN CreditScore ON Customer.customer_id = CreditScore.customer_id;
SELECT employer_name, annual_income FROM Employment WHERE employment_status = 'Employed' ORDER BY annual_income DESC;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date, loan_duration FROM Loan WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT full_name, phone_number, date_of_birth FROM Customer WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT c.full_name, l.loan_amount, l.loan_date FROM Customer c INNER JOIN Loan l ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id;
SELECT p.payment_date, p.payment_amount, l.loan_amount FROM Loan l INNER JOIN PaymentHistory p ON l.loan_id = p.loan_id WHERE p.payment_status = 'Successful' ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC;
SELECT e.customer_id, e.employer_name, e.annual_income, l.loan_amount FROM Employment e LEFT JOIN Loan l ON e.customer_id = l.customer_id WHERE e.employment_status = 'Employed';
SELECT c.full_name, cs.credit_score, cs.report_date FROM Customer c INNER JOIN CreditScore cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id WHERE cs.credit_score > 700 ORDER BY cs.report_date ASC;
